#summary List of available modules
#sidebar PluginBar

 * *mycila-testing-all*: Contains all plugins plus the API, and embedded dependencies (mycila-plugin and JGraphT). Does not contain any dependencies relative to plugins. It is up to you t decide what you want to use.

{{{
<dependency>
    <groupId>com.google.code.mycila.testing</groupId>
    <artifactId>mycila-testing-all</artifactId>
    <version>X.Y</version>
</dependency>
}}}

 * *[TestingAPI Plugin API]*: The plugin API is the module used by all plugins, and also to enhance tests.

{{{
<dependency>
    <groupId>com.google.code.mycila.testing</groupId>
    <artifactId>mycila-testing-api</artifactId>
    <version>X.Y</version>
</dependency>
}}}

 * *[PluginJMock2 JMock 2 Plugin]*: JMock integration

{{{
<dependency>
    <groupId>com.google.code.mycila.testing.plugins</groupId>
    <artifactId>mycila-testing-jmock</artifactId>
    <version>X.Y</version>
</dependency>
}}}
